TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit NetworkCredential extends System.Object implements class System.Net.ICredentials, class System.Net.ICredentialsByHost
Public Class NetworkCredential Implements ICredentials, ICredentialsByHost
public ref class NetworkCredential : System::Net::ICredentials, System::Net::ICredentialsByHost
type NetworkCredential = class interface ICredentials interface ICredentialsByHost

summary.span: 提供密碼驗證配置的認證，例如基本、摘要式、NTLM 和 Kerberos 驗證。

span.span: Provides credentials for password-based authentication schemes such as basic, digest, NTLM, and Kerberos authentication.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 類別是基底類別，提供以密碼為基礎的驗證配置，例如基本、 摘要式、 NTLM 和 Kerberos 認證。The class is a base class that supplies credentials in password-based authentication schemes such as basic, digest, NTLM, and Kerberos. 類別實作介面，例如類別中，傳回物件。Classes that implement the interface, such as the class, return objects. 這個類別不支援公用金鑰為基礎的驗證方法，例如安全通訊端層 (SSL) 用戶端驗證。This class does not support public key-based authentication methods such as Secure Sockets Layer (SSL) client authentication. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例 associates物件的統一資源識別元 (Uri) 的一組。The following code example associates a object with a set of Uniform Resource Identifiers (URIs) in a . 它接著會傳遞至物件，會用它來驗證網際網路伺服器的要求。It then passes the to a object, which uses it to authenticate requests to an Internet server. [!code-cpp[Classic NetworkCredential Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic NetworkCredential Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic NetworkCredential Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic NetworkCredential Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic NetworkCredential Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic NetworkCredential Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 建構函式初始化物件屬性設定為`userName`並屬性設定為`password`。The constructor initializes a object with the property set to `userName` and the property set to `password`. `password`參數是執行個體。The `password` parameter is a instance. 如果使用這個建構函式呼叫`password`參數設定為`null`的新執行個體初始化時，如果此平台上不支援安全的字串則就會擲回If this constructor is called with the `password` parameter set to `null`, a new instance of is initialized, If secure strings are not supported on this platform, then the is thrown

summary.span: 取得或設定驗證認證的網域或電腦名稱。

span.span: Gets or sets the domain or computer name that verifies the credentials.

value.span: 與認證相關的網域名稱。

span.span: The name of the domain associated with the credentials.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性指定的網域或使用者名稱所屬的領域。The property specifies the domain or realm to which the user name belongs. 一般而言，這是應用程式執行所在的主機電腦名稱或目前登入使用者的使用者網域。Typically, this is the host computer name where the application runs or the user domain for the currently logged in user. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例使用来設定與認證相關聯的網域屬性。The following code example uses the property to set the domain associated with the credentials.
